info.title: BNA Helpdesk REST API Docs
info.description: This documentation summarizes all the calls to our REST API.

get.summary: Get a listing of the CategorieApplicatifs.

post.summary: Store a newly created CategorieApplicatif in storage

put.summary: Update the specified CategorieApplicatif in storage

delete.summary: Remove the specified CategorieApplicatif from storage

get.summary: Get a listing of the CategorieMateriels.

post.summary: Store a newly created CategorieMateriel in storage

put.summary: Update the specified CategorieMateriel in storage

delete.summary: Remove the specified CategorieMateriel from storage

get.summary: Get a listing of the Missions.

post.summary: Store a newly created Mission in storage

put.summary: Update the specified Mission in storage

get.summary: Get a listing of the Tickets.

post.summary: Store a newly created Ticket in storage

put.summary: Update the specified Ticket in storage

delete.summary: Remove the specified Ticket from storage

get.summary: Get a listing of the Users.

post.summary: Store a newly created User in storage

put.summary: Update the specified User in storage

delete.summary: Remove the specified User from storage
